FuncDef: The display user-queue configuration command displays the HQoS configuration on an interface.
CLIs: display user-queue configuration interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ inbound | outbound ]

ParaDef.Info:
Display the usage of user queues for incoming traffic.
-

Display the usage of user queues for outcoming traffic.
-

Specifies an interface number, which is made up of the slot number of an interface board, card number, and port number.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After HQoS is configured on an interface, you can run the display user-queue configuration command to query HQoS configuration, which includes CIR and PIR information.
